author: fielding
msg: shades of a bad global replace --- fixed comment

author: rbb
msg: Add buffered I/O back into APR's file I/O on unix.  This code comes from
the OS/2 code, and has been munged to make it compile.  This has not been
tested, but unbuffered I/O still works.

author: rbb
msg: apr_config.h is a private include file, and shouldn't be used by any

author: stoddard
msg: Allow for the possibility of receiving data regardless of the pipe

assumes that a read returning APR_SUCCESS with 0 bytes read is equivalent
